li.data-alt: Hall of Honor invite to nominate
Retired teachers present library donations to ACW students.

p.span: Thank you Northeast Hunt County Retired Teachers--
Representatives Kay Jensen and Bettina Zvanut presented 45 new books to students in the ACW library. The teachers donate books to two schools in CISD. Donations are welcome.

li.data-alt: Two girls hold I love Coding sign.

and newsletters

p.span: Fill in the blanks below and we'll add you to our list of people who receive the monthly Campus Highlights and On Board e-newsletters and School Messenger alerts.

div.a: Resources available for families during COVID-19

div.div: CISD Family Services has pulled together resources available to help families during this time. Please click on the link to find help locally for many different...Read more...
Though we are apart right now for our health and safety, we are Commerce ISD continue to support each other as a community, and right now we must work together ...Read more...
Per Governor Abbott's orders, Commerce ISD will remain closed through April 30. Schools cannot reopen until May 4. Parents should contact administrators if they...Read more...

div.p: In partnership with families and community, CISD will provide all students an exemplary education, preparing them to be successful, productive citizens.
